name: MILA, The Rescue and SID, The Escape - Remix Edition
name_original: MILA, The Rescue and SID, The Escape - Remix Edition
description:
Arcade Platform Action in classic style. You can choose two characters, with different missions and forms to play the stages. 

-------

2 games in 1! Arcade Platform Action in classic style. 

You can choose two characters, you can control Mila in a rescue mission, or Sid in a Escape mission. Each one start in different stages and unique way to complete the levels. 

Colourful and animated worlds in platform action game, strange enemies, and vehicles. Levels like Caves, forests, ships, waters, castles and inside of a big monster. 

More than 100 screens in 11 levels. Remember the good times of platform games playing Mila and Sid.

-----------

HOW TO PLAY

Left - Left Arrow
Right - Right Arrow
Jump - Up Arrow
Down - Down Arrow
Shoot - Space Bar

-----------

MILA, The Rescue and SID, The Escape - Remix Edition

-----------
